description: This Python module provides a singleton service for initializing and accessing a Supabase client in a server-side environment. It lazily creates the client using environment variables, with thread safety, and exposes a function for other modules to obtain the client instance.

methods.name: _create_client
methods.description: Creates a new Supabase client using environment variables, with error handling for missing configuration or creation failure.

methods.name: get_supabase
methods.description: Returns a lazily-initialized singleton instance of the Supabase client, thread-safe.
